thread.title: FAA to order inspections of jet engines after Southwest accident

title: FAA to order inspections of jet engines after Southwest accident
text:
FAA to order inspections of jet engines after Southwest accident 7:52pm BST - 01:46 
The U.S. Federal Aviation Administration said it will order an inspection of about 220 aircraft engines as investigators have found that a broken fan blade touched off an engine explosion this week on a Southwest flight, killing a passenger. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
